name: Dodging Beats
description:
Dodging Beats is a fun music avoid game. Dodge enemies with your cursor as they come at you to the beat.

Can you dodge the beats? They come at you from all different directions. This game has 10 different songs to play. Can you unlock all the achievements?

Check out the settings for an Easy Mode if you want extra health, or use a virtual joystick if you are using a touch screen. Send me a PM or Email with any ideas. All music is from open source creators from opengameart.org with cc licenses. 

Enjoy.

Play similar games at:
http://flashcartoons.org/games.php
